snippet: A new trial expected to start this week will determine how much Samsung has to pay for an important suit it lost.
abstract: New trial expected to start shortly will determine how much Samsung has to pay for an important patent suit it lost with Apple in 2012; decision could have bearing on future patent awards.
lead_paragraph: A new trial expected to start this week will determine how much Samsung has to pay for an important suit it lost.

headline.main: Jury to Decide How Much More Samsung Must Pay Apple in Patent Case
headline.print_headline: Jury to Decide How Much More Samsung Must Pay Apple in Patent Case
